original: bi ma la sunda ri s'a dha nam /
analyzed: bi ma la sunda ri s'a dha nam /

original: dri med mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dri med mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement of Vimalaprabhā

original: aom bi ma la sunda ri aa /
analyzed: aom bi ma la sunda ri aa /

original: zhes so // dpal rdo rje 'chang gi lha khang du ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dang ; gu gul gyi spos phul nas sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes so // dpal rdo rje 'chang gi lha khang du ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dang ; gu gul gyi spos phul nas sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By offering jasmine flowers and agallochum incense in the temple of glorious Vajradhara, and reciting the mantra eight thousand times, she will certainly come.

original: byung ba dang / me tog gi gdugs dbul la khams bde'am zhes brjod la /
analyzed: byung ba dang / me tog gi gdugs dbul la khams bde'am zhes brjod la /
translated: When she arrives, one should offer her a flower parasol and ask, “Are you well?”

original: bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces brjod do //
analyzed: bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces brjod do //

original: des dngul chu dang bcud len dang grub pa'i rdzas rnams ster ba @157a * //
analyzed: des dngul chu dang bcud len dang grub pa'i rdzas rnams ster ba @157a * //
translated: She will give one the elixir of immortality, the elixir of power, and the substances of accomplishment.

original: dang dgra thams cad gsod pa dang / rgyab tu khur nas lha'i yul ston pa dang / tshe lo khri phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang dgra thams cad gsod pa dang / rgyab tu khur nas lha'i yul ston pa dang / tshe lo khri phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro //
translated: She will kill all one’s enemies, carry one on her back to the god realm, and one will live for ten thousand years.

original: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas mthe chung phyir bskyed pa ni 'byung mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas mthe chung phyir bskyed pa ni 'byung mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra of the bhūtas is to make a fist with the left hand and extend the little finger.

original: dri med mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: dri med mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana called Stainless Beauty is complete.
